ygData.subject: Re: Entrance to the sewers and other things
ygData.msgSnippet: On my server (Povar) I heard rumors that a group, low 30s in level, recently went after Ghoulsbane.  According to what I heard they barely made it out alive,
ygData.messageBody:
On my server (Povar) I heard rumors that a group, low 30s in level, recently
went after Ghoulsbane. According to what I heard they barely made it out
alive, they had to escape via group teleport. Let us know how your attempt
goes, I'm very curious.

As far as secret entrances in Freeport goes, I do know they exist, they lead
to a sewer system. I would just hug the outside wall until you stumble into
it. A lot of evil players use these to reach the docks, and I do know part
of them go by the Cleric's and Paladin's guild. BTW there is also a secret
entrance to the city in Qeynos too. The one I found was to the left of the
gates, before you enter the city. Be carefull though, lower levels may be
attacked by creatures fairly often.

>On a note about
>Ghoulsbane, the crew I'm with will be attempting to get a few of those
>this weekend. One thing I know for sure, don't try it if your under
>20th level. The rumor is the FroggerKing is close to level 30.
>
>4. I remember seeing a message regarding a back entrance to North
>Freeport. I am curious if anyone has better details of this. I plan
>on rampaging those evil guards this weekend (very holy-type evil grin).
>
>
>In the service of Brell,
>
>Anguss of Cazic_Thule
>
>
>------------------------------------------------------------------------
>Tired of empty chat rooms and out of date bulletin boards?
>http://www.ONElist.com
>ONElist: Making the Internet Intimate
